lines: at 3m, we discover and innovate in nearly every industry to help solve problems around the world.
this is a two-part liquid epoxy kit suitable for patching pipe coatings
each part, a and b, comes in a quart-sized can container
can be used as a patch material, a girthweld coating, a stand alone coating for pipe rehabilitation, and in a wide variety of other field applications
the brands listed above are trademarks of 3m

3m scotchkote liquid epoxy coating, 327, 450 ml cartridge
helps protect steel pipes and other metal surfaces from corrosion
3m scotchkote liquid epoxy coating 327 is a two-part system designed to protect steel pipe and other metal surfaces from the harsh affects of corrosion for temperatures down to 50°f/10°c.
thank you for contacting 3m electrical construction
helping to protect metal surfaces from corrosion

it can be used as a patch material, a girthweld coating, a stand alone coating for pipe rehabilitation, and also in a wide variety of other field applications where corrosion protection of metal is required.
